arts.ttl: AC Milan’s possible lineup vs Napoli
arts.sum: Kickoff for Milan-Napoli is getting closer, the match will close out Serie A’s Sunday schedule at 20:45 at San Siro. It is also the first head-to-head between Massimiliano Allegri and Antonio Conte in an official game since 2013, when Max was on the Milan bench and Conte was leading Juventus, as pointed out by Milan News. arts.sum: The final exam comes much earlier for Milan and Napoli this year.
